# VNHumanBodyPose3DObservation.HeightEstimation.measured

**Case**

A technique that uses LiDAR depth data to measure body height, in meters.

## Declaration

```swift
case measured
```

## Techniques

- **VNHumanBodyPose3DObservation.HeightEstimation.reference**: A technique that uses a reference height.
